title: R scripts for FEAT
text: goal FEATR provide tidy package frequently used R files Echoview processing. package initial state undergoing considerable updates.

title: R scripts for FEAT
text: repository FEATR package can found NOAA-FEAT GitHub page FEATR.

title: R scripts for FEAT
text: can install development version GitHub :

title: R scripts for FEAT
text: update paths EV files directory (update .raw files, calibration files, etc), use repath_EVdir(SurveyName,DirNameFile, ni=1) SurveyName name survey referenced row excel file DirNameFile. excel file list paths filenames named columns, row “survey.” ni number EVfile directory list start processing . default ni=1. set export parameters within EV file, use SetBiomassExpParamsFun(Obj_ExpVar, ToExport,NoExport), Obj_ExpVar Echoview object acoustic variable, ToExport list parameters exported, NoExport list parameters exported. ’s handy keep separate columns excel file

title: SetBiomassExpParamsFun — SetBiomassExpParamsFun

what:
createlog:  Using a single or multiple survey/legs, open the EV file, export the region log, and concatenate 
the logs into a single file called CruiseLog.csv — createlog

text: SurveyName - name survey DirNameFile excel file - contains paths locations files exportloc optional argument using Export_Dir Region_Export_dir column entry DirNameFile spreadsheet.  1 Export_Dir, 0 Region_Export_dir

title:
createlog:  Using a single or multiple survey/legs, open the EV file, export the region log, and concatenate 
the logs into a single file called CruiseLog.csv — createlog
code: SurveyName='2022_LEG1LOG' SurveyName=c('2022_LEG1LOG', '2022_LEG2LOG') DirNameFile='C:/rthomas/R/Rcode/EK60_EK80 conversion/EK60_EK80_conv_updated/Directory Structure EK60 EK80 conversion updated.xlsx' createlog(SurveyName,DirNameFile) #> Error: `path` does not exist: ‘C:/rthomas/R/Rcode/EK60_EK80 conversion/EK60_EK80_conv_updated/Directory Structure EK60 EK80 conversion updated.xlsx’

title: export_integration_EV — export_integration_EV
text: function export integration variables set EV files.   two excel files inputs (paths, parameters export).  exports go directory automatically named date.  directory export directory listed DirNameFile.  EVfile saved process.

title: export_integration_EV — export_integration_EV
code: export_integration_EV(   Survey_Name,   DirNameFile,   variables,   paramnamefile = NA,   ni = 1,   gdepth = 10,   database = 1,   ... )

title: export_integration_EV — export_integration_EV
text: DirNameFile excel file name paths variables - variables read (subdirectories need named variables) paramnamefile optional excel file name parameters export export. column ToExport parameters export.  column NoExport parameters export ni optional argument file start (default ni=1 first file). defaults 1 (EV files) gdepth optional argument cell depth.  gdepth defaults 10 m database optional argument export format.  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0 SurveyName name survey excel file

what: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EV_exports
title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EV_exports
text: Read directory .csv files (can several variables)  exported Echoview.   function preserves cells depth.  Uses packages readxl, readr, purrr, dplyr.

title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EV_exports
read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EV_exports
text: var - variables read (subdirectories need named variables) SurveyName - name survey DirNameFile excel file - contains paths locations files database optional argument format .csv files .  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0 exportloc optional argument using Export_Dir Region_Export_dir column entry DirNameFile spreadsheet.  1 Export_Dir, 0 Region_Export_dir

title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EV_exports
code: temp<-read_EV_exports(variables[1], SurveyName, DirNameFile,database=1,exportloc=1) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'DirNameFile' not found

what:
read_EV_exports_compile: Read and append certain columns from multiple
variable Echoview exports — read_EV_exports_compile
title:
read_EV_exports_compile: Read and append certain columns from multiple
variable Echoview exports — read_EV_exports_compile
text: Reads variables multiple EV files.  columns  first variable completely kep.  requested columns (CompCols) rest variables appended onto end dataframe.  Usually exports multiple EV files.  Reads multiple  variables exported  EV file.    Example columns Sv_mean PRC_NASC.

title:
read_EV_exports_compile: Read and append certain columns from multiple
variable Echoview exports — read_EV_exports_compile
code: read_EV_exports_compile(   variables,   CompCols,   SurveyName,   DirNameFile,   database = 1,   exportloc = 1,   ... )

title:
read_EV_exports_compile: Read and append certain columns from multiple
variable Echoview exports — read_EV_exports_compile
text: variables - variables read (subdirectories need named variables) SurveyName - name survey DirNameFile excel file - contains paths locations files database optional argument format .csv files input.  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0 exportloc optional argument using Export_Dir Region_Export_dir column entry DirNameFile spreadsheet.  1 Export_Dir, 0 Region_Export_dir ComCols - columns kept non-primary variable appended  end data.

title: repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
text: Function take directory EV files reset path. works EV files just EK80 fileset, EK60 file set first fileset, EK80 second fileset. May want eventually convert calling "fileset1" "fileset2" instead EK60 EK80. Written RT 2022. Requires excel file input hat says paths row survey (survey_name), column path file name

title: repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
text: SurveyName name survey excel file DirNameFile excel file name paths ni optional argument file start (default ni=1 first file). Excel file following columns (header names) Cal_File: calibration file name Base_Path: Orig_EV_Dir: Raw_Dir EK80_Cal_File EK80_Raw_Dir

title: repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
code: DirNameFile="C:/rthomas/R/Rcode/EK60_EK80 conversion/EK60_Ek80_conv_updated/Directory Structure EK60 EK80 conversion updated.xlsx" SurveyName='2019_US' repath_EVdir(SurveyName,DirNameFile) #> Error: `path` does not exist: ‘C:/rthomas/R/Rcode/EK60_EK80 conversion/EK60_Ek80_conv_updated/Directory Structure EK60 EK80 conversion updated.xlsx’

text: DirNameFile excel file name paths ni optional argument file start (default ni=1 first file). Excel file following columns (header names) Cal_File: calibration file name Base_Path: Orig_EV_Dir: Raw_Dir EK80_Cal_File EK80_Raw_Dir SurveyName name survey excel file
